articles.description: Real Madrid crowned champions of La Liga for the 36th time after Barcelona lose against Girona.
articles.title: La Liga: Real Madrid champions after Barcelona lose to Girona

articles.description: Arsenal are left "praying" as Manchester City home in on a fourth successive Premier League title, writes Simon Stone.
articles.title: Premier League title race: 'Arsenal left praying while Man City shine as end game nears'

articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen beats Ferrari’s Charles Leclerc to pole position at the Miami Grand Prix.
articles.title: Miami Grand Prix 2024: Max Verstappen beats Charles Leclerc to pole

articles.description: Since dropping points against Arsenal in March both Erling Haaland and Manchester City have delivered the perfect response.
articles.title: Erling Haaland responds to Roy Keane criticism after Manchester City win

articles.description: World number one Iga Swiatek holds her nerve to beat world number two Aryna Sabalenka and win her first Madrid Open.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Iga Swiatek beats Aryna Sabalenka in thrilling final

articles.description: Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez beats fellow Mexican Jaime Munguia by a unanimous points decision to retain his WBA, WBC, WBO and IBF super-middleweight titles in Las Vegas.
articles.title: Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez beats Jaime Munguia to defend WBA, WBC, WBO and IBF titles

articles.description: Toulouse's "fear factor" means Harlequins could need a "10 out of 10 performance" to reach the Investec Champions Cup final, says scrum-half Danny Care.
articles.title: Investec Champions Cup: Danny Care on Harlequins' semi-final against Toulouse

articles.description: Burnley's 12th defeat at home this season means they are five points adrift of 17th-placed Nottingham Forest with two games remaining.
articles.title: Burnley 1-4 Newcastle: Vincent Kompany's side 'doomed' after loss

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Girona vs Barcelona in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Girona vs Barcelona: Spanish La Liga - BBC Sport

articles.description: Kyren Wilson claims a comfortable 17-11 win over David Gilbert to reach his second World Championship final at the Crucible Theatre.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship: Kyren Wilson beats David Gilbert to reach second Crucible final
